name: City Explorer
description:
Prototype of an early gameplay idea, it might become so much more later in other versions,but for now works properly to just fool around a city block.

Stuff used in this prototype:

Several Assets from Unity Asset Store: Text Mesh Pro, Flat Style Vehicles Pack 1.0,  Low Poly City Block, Low Poly Street Pack 1.0, characters by Mixamo.

Prefab spawners , NavMesh  agents and obstacles, scriptable objects, Inventory System, UI, etc by me.
